contents.item: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
Stay focused, accept everything as perfect and keep moving forward toward the direction of your goals.
contents.owner: Mike Basevic, No Limits, Mastering the Mental Egde: The Class They Don't Teach You in School

contents.item: It is never wise to run any race but your own.
A tenacious grip on our own ideals, irrespective of hurdles, would propel us towards self-actualization!
We might do well to take a look at what we’ve crammed into our pockets as it will say much about what we’ve crammed into our hearts.
The scarcity of time is the reason we have to concentrate on one thing at a time.
contents.owner: Matt Perman, What's Best Next: How the Gospel Transforms the Way You Get Things Done

contents.item: Hopefully and devoutly focus on your greater possibilities.
contents.owner: Bryant McGill, Simple Reminders: Inspiration for Living Your Best Life

contents.item: Now I feel free, and hope is creeping back. Maybe because I'm paying attention to what I have rather than what's missing.
Stop obsessing about where you invest your money. Focus instead, on where you invest your time.
Personally, I’m choosing to dwell upon the glory of the kingdom of which I am a part, even though I’m still a witness and sometimes a victim of the junk in ‘this’ world.
contents.owner: Van Harden, Life in the Purple Wedge!

contents.item: Adversity is inevitable. Staying positive is optional.
contents.owner: Maddy Malhotra, How to Build Self-Esteem and Be Confident: Overcome Fears, Break Habits, Be Successful and Happy

contents.item: Challenges are inevitable. Happiness is optional.
contents.owner: Maddy Malhotra, How to Build Self-Esteem and Be Confident: Overcome Fears, Break Habits, Be Successful and Happy

contents.item: Problems are inevitable. Staying in control of your emotions is optional.
contents.owner: Maddy Malhotra, How to Build Self-Esteem and Be Confident: Overcome Fears, Break Habits, Be Successful and Happy

contents.item: Life is simple. It is meant to be lived. Don't over-complicate things. Don't lose your life in the things that don't matter.
